column4: Im a Ubuntu edgy eft user, I have a really stable system now, is there any real reason to dist-upgrade?
I should think if you want to be with the times

We were all stable in the forest/living in caves and hunting but we started building jungles of concrete, right? Though if you enable the backport repo, your edgy will almost be feisty, still "almost"
you willing to pay for propriety stuff?
